name: stock_cashflow_statement
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool yahoo_finance_v2.
Tool description: Yahoo Finance API for stocks, options, ETFs, mutual funds and news. Moved to: https://rapidapi.com/sparior/api/mboum-finance
API description: Fetches the cash flow statement for a given stock symbol from Yahoo Finance using RapidAPI.

symbol.description: The stock symbol for which to fetch the cash flow statement.
